title: Closing Hamilton streets over COVID-19, and other updates from Niagara, Brant and H-N - CBC.ca

content:
A group of residents is asking Hamilton city council to temporarily close James Street North so people have more space to walk during the COVID-19 pandemic.
A letter to city council says this would be a pilot project for other Hamilton street closures during… [+4658 chars]
